forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A good deal of sunshine. High 12C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High 54F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low near 5C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 41F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 14C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 57F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Low 8C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low around 45F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. High 12C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 53F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 6C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 43F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 12C. Winds SE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 53F. Winds SE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 7C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low around 45F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 11C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 51F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 8C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 46F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 14C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 56F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with showers. Becoming windy overnight. Low around 10C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers, with increasing winds overnight. Low 49F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 12C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers, with increasing winds in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 8C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 46F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 12C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 53F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A shower or two possible early with partly cloudy skies later at night. Low 6C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then clearing overnight. Low 43F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny along with a few clouds. High 13C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High near 55F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 7C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 43F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High near 55F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low 6C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low 43F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
